text: I di madagoaa di King Josiah, gei Dimaadua ga helekai mai, “E hai behee? Goe gu gidee di hai o Israel, nia hai o di ahina dee manawa dahi ala ne hai go mee? Mee guu huli gi daha mo Au, guu hai gadoo be di ahina huihui dono huaidina i hongo nia gowaa nnoonua huogodoo, mo i lala nia laagau mangamanga huogodoo.3.6 2 Kings 22.1—23.30; 2 Kronikel 34.1—35.27
